name: Gun Beat
description:
Beat enemies to the beat. Avoid bullets to survive.‘Gun Beat’ is a VR game that combines rhythm and shooting. Beat the enemy with a rhythm! Oh, don't forget to avoid bullets, too!Game Play
  • Just remember two things about Gun Beat. "Beat enemies to the beat. Avoid bullets to survive." There are only two operating buttons: Trigger and Grip.
  • You have to shoot at the beat. Perfect, Good, Bad, and Miss depending on the accuracy.
  • Move your body to avoid bullets.
  • You build a combo. Then you can see the sign of Fever in front of your eyes. Press the Grip button at the same time to start the Fever Time. With Fever Time, you become invincible, ignoring beats, and getting more scores! Don't miss Fever!
  • There are Tutorial, Infinity, and Stage modes.
